description: We helps retail and restaurant chains big and small deliver great customer experiences, putting money back in their budget and time back in their day.
generated_description:
### Company Overview: OpenWrench

**Website:** [OpenWrench](https://www.useopenwrench.com)  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S18  

OpenWrench is a tech-driven solution designed specifically for retailers and restaurant chains, helping them manage repairs and maintenance tasks more efficiently. Their mission is clear: to enable businesses to enhance customer experiences by saving money and time, thus allowing teams to focus on what matters most—delivering great service to their customers. 

Despite a seemingly modest start, OpenWrench has positioned itself as a key player in the facilities maintenance space, making significant strides in managing communication between operational teams and maintenance staff. This leads to a seamless experience in tracking maintenance issues across multiple locations.

#### Solution Features

- **Centralized Communication**: OpenWrench provides a single platform for stores, operations, and maintenance teams, ensuring everyone stays in the loop. This real-time group messaging feature facilitates quick and effective communication.
  
- **Issue Tracking and Reporting**: Users can easily report and manage facilities and IT problems through their mobile devices or computers. This functionality ensures that potential issues are caught early and addressed promptly.
  
- **Task and Asset Management**: The platform automatically generates work orders for recurring maintenance tasks and allows businesses to maintain a comprehensive database of their assets, including warranty statuses.
  
- **Custom Inspections**: Companies can set up site inspections and create tailored maintenance task lists, helping to uphold brand standards consistently across all locations.
  
- **Vendor Management**: OpenWrench allows businesses to maintain a preferred list of service providers, helping them track performances and streamline repairs when needed.

#### Customer Testimonials

The feedback from current users highlights the platform's effectiveness. For instance, one project manager noted, "OpenWrench is an excellent way to plan for repairs and maintenance work," while a senior facility director emphasized the tool's flexibility and customization options. These testimonials shed light on OpenWrench's valuable role in enhancing operational efficiency.

#### Why OpenWrench?

The company has garnered trust from a variety of notable brands across North America, including [Gold's Gym](https://www.useopenwrench.com), [Planet Fitness](https://www.useopenwrench.com), and [Orangetheory](https://www.useopenwrench.com), to name a few. 

OpenWrench's blend of efficient communication, comprehensive asset management, and ease of use makes it a notable force in the enterprise technology landscape focused on facilities maintenance. If you're looking to streamline maintenance management for your chain, it could be worth checking out their offerings. 

For more information or to request a demo, visit [OpenWrench](https://www.useopenwrench.com).
